IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: Supports the programs and clients of the Regional Institute for Children and Adolescents-Rockville, an agency of the state of Maryland Department of Health.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: Scholarships-graduating seniors are able to apply for college/independent living scholarships. Nine scholarships were provided during this fiscal year under this program. In addition, senior year students are able to enroll in a school scholarship program and receive financial assistance to go to the local community college while in high school. Nine scholarships were awarded under this program during this fiscal year.

Other programs-the Association funds for projects and programs that are not covered by the state RICA facility. These programs include summer enrichment program, prom, treehouse, holiday parties, student trips, etc.

TransferPrsnlBnftContractsDecl.DeclarationDesc: The organization did not, during the year, receive any funds, directly,or indirectly, to pay premiums on a personal benefit contract.The organization, did not, during the year, pay any premiums, directly,or indirectly, on a personal benefit contract.
